data.name: Add New Roles
Add New Users
Allows assigning or removing roles for any user.
data.value: 允許為任何用戶分配或移除角色。

data.name: Allows modification of role names and their assigned permissions.
data.value: 允許修改角色名稱及其分配的權限。

data.name: Allows modification of user details like email and roles, and can also reset user passwords.
data.value: 允許修改使用者詳細資料，例如電郵地址和角色，並可重設使用者密碼。

data.name: Allows the permanent deletion of roles.
Allows the permanent deletion of user accounts.
data.value: 允許永久刪除用戶帳戶。

data.name: Allows viewing and modifying global application settings.
data.value: 允許檢視及修改應用程式全域設定。

data.name: Allows viewing system-level information and settings.
data.value: 允許查看系統級資訊和設定。

data.name: Allows viewing the background job dashboard and managing jobs.
data.value: 容許檢視背景工作儀錶板及管理作業。

data.name: Allows viewing the list of all permissions and their assignments to roles and users.
data.value: 允許檢視所有權限及其指派給角色和使用者的清單。

data.name: Allows viewing the list of all users.
data.value: 允許查看所有用戶列表。

data.name: Allows viewing the list of roles and their assigned permissions.
data.value: 允許查看角色列表及其分配的權限。

data.name: Assign Roles to Users
Delete Roles
Delete Users
Edit Role Information
Edit User Information
Grants permission to create new roles.
data.value: 授予創建新角色嘅權限。

data.name: Grants permission to create new user accounts.
data.value: 授予建立新用戶帳戶的權限。

data.name: Grants permission to restart the application instance. May cause availability interruptions but all settings and cache will be reloaded.
data.value: 授予重啟應用程式實例嘅權限。可能會導致服務中斷，但所有設定同快取將會重新載入。

data.name: Manage Global Settings
Read Permissions
Read Roles
Read Users
Reboot This App
View Background Jobs
View System Context
